titles.title: Microbead-Free Waters Act of 2014
A bill to prohibit the sale or distribution of certain cosmetics containing synthetic plastic microbeads.
Microbead-Free Waters Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary: Microbead-Free Waters Act of 2014 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the distribution of a cosmetic that contains synthetic plastic microbeads beginning on January 1, 2018.
